titleStmt.title: To His Excellency, General Monck A letter from the gentlemen of Devon : in answer to his Lordships of January 23. to them directed from Leicester.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704, attributed name.
Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: A letter of General George Monck's, dated at Leicester 23 Jan. and directed unto Mr. Rolle to be communicated unto the rest of the gentry of Devon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
